name: Ajak
description: The Eternal Ajak is the spiritual leader of the group, guiding the Eternals on their mission from their home planet to Earth to defend humankind from the predatorial Deviants.

name: Ant-Man
description: Overcoming his criminal past, Scott Lang follows in the tiny, yet mighty, footsteps of his predecessor as the size-changing hero known as Ant-Ma

name: Att-Lass
description: Att-Lass is Starforce's stealth and infiltration specialist.

name: Black Panther
description: T Challa is the king of the secretive and highly advanced African nation of Wakanda - as well as the powerful warrior known as the Black Panther

name: Black Widow
description: Natasha Romanoff, separated from the now-fractured Avengers, confronts the dark path she took to becoming a spy and assassin, as well as events that followe

name: Yelena
description: A product of the Red Roomâ€™s ruthless training programs, this fiery assassin has a secret history with the Black Widow that she is determined to addres

name: Bron-Char
description: The Starforce team's muscle, Bron-Char uses brute force against the Skrulls.

name: Captain America
description: Recipient of the Super Soldier serum, World War II hero Steve Rogers fights for American ideals as one of the worldâ€™s mightiest heroes and the leader of the Avengers.

name: Captain Marvel
description: Carol Danvers becomes one of the universe's most powerful heroes when Earth is caught in the middle of a galactic war between two alien race

name: The Collector
description: Offbeat alien Taneleer Tivan seeks both objects and living creatures that he finds of interest for his massive collection, including unwilling participants and dangerous weapon

name: Corvus Glaive
description: A loyal follower of Thanos, Corvus Glaive is a force to be reckoned with as he relentlessly strikes against those in his pat

name: Doctor Erik Selvig
description: Dr. Erik Selvig, astrophysicist and professor, contributes his substantial knowledge to help the Avengers defeat their foes.

name: Doctor Strange
movie: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
description: Formerly a renowned surgeon, Doctor Stephen Strange now serves as the Sorcerer Supremeâ€”Earthâ€™s foremost protector against magical and mystical threats.

name: Dormammu
description: Originating in the aptly-named Dark Dimension, this incredibly powerful being has ominous plans for Earth and those who live there.

name: Drax
description: Drax uses his super strength and combat skills to destroy any enemies of the galaxy.

name: Druig
description: Druig has the powerful ability to control the minds of humans with his cosmic energy, which at times makes it difficult to determine if heâ€™s friend or foe

name: Ebony Maw
description: Ruthlessly carrying out his master's orders, Ebony Maw uses his formidable powers to enforce Thanos' rul

name: Ego
description: Ancient and unbelievably powerful, Ego has the power of an entire planet at his disposal

name: Erik Killmonger
description: Raised in America, the man known as Erik Killmonger returns to his father's home of Wakanda determined to overthrow T'Challa and rule the nation himself

name: Skurge
description: Asgardian warrior turned Executioner under Hela's command, Skurge deals with internal conflict as to whether he should save his people or exploit his newfound power

name: Gamora
description: Raised by Thanos to be a living weapon, Gamora seeks redemption as a member of the Guardians of the Galaxy, putting her extraordinary fighting abilities to good use

name: Gilgamesh
description: The powerful Eternal Gilgamesh is a fierce warrior remembered throughout history for his legendary battles.

name: Goose the Cat
description: The friendliest and furriest resident of Project Pegasus, Goose is the affectionate tabby cat that joins Carol Danvers and Nick Fury on their adventure.

name: Grandmaster
description: Everything is a game to this cosmic entity, who loves to pit beings against each other for his own amusement

name: Groot
description: This sentient alien tree branches out of his comfort zone to help the Guardians of the Galaxy keep the people of the universe safe.

name: Hank Pym
description: Dr. Henry â€œHankâ€ Pym, the creator of the wondrous Pym Particles, has been a crimefighting hero, brilliant inventor, and fearless explore

name: Hawkeye
description: A master marksman and longtime friend of Black Widow, Clint Barton serves as the Avengersâ€™ amazing archer.

name: Heimdall
description: An all-seeing Asgardian in charge of guarding the Rainbow Bridge known as the Bifrost, Heimdall's keen skills serve him well as a first line of defense.

name: Hela
description: With family ties to the rulers of Asgard, Hela seeks power (and followers) for herself.

name: Howard Stark
description: Brilliant engineer, inventor, businessman, and founder of Stark Industries, Howard Stark is the mastermind behind the company that his son, Tony Stark, will one day inherit

name: Hulk
description: Dr. Bruce Banner lives a life caught between the soft-spoken scientist heâ€™s always been and the uncontrollable green monster powered by his rage.

name: Ikaris
description: The powerful Eternal Ikaris is the moral, charismatic tactician of the group, tasked with keeping his team and humanity safe

name: Melina
description: Melina is a highly trained spy who has been cycled through the Red Roomâ€™s Widow program four times

name: Iron Man
description: Genius. Billionaire. Philanthropist. Tony Stark's confidence is only matched by his high-flying abilities as the hero called Iron Ma

name: Kingo
description: The boisterous Eternal Kingo, enamored with the idea of fame, has taken the most advantage of his centuries-long time on Earth.

name: Ulysses Klaue
description: An ongoing enemy of Wakanda and its people, this clever criminal would replace his lost arm with a powerful weapon.

name: Korath
description: Stoic, humorless and disciplined, Korath is second-in-command in the elite Starforce

name: Loki
description: God of Mischief and brother to Thor, Lokiâ€™s tricks and schemes wreak havoc across the realms.

name: Makkari
description: With her cosmic-powered super-speed, Makkari scouts planets for the Eternals, a group of ancient, immortal beings working on behalf of the Celestial

name: Mantis
description: Mantis uses her powers to protect the galaxy against those who would seek to harm it

name: Maria Rambeau
description: A former test fighter pilot and Carol Danvers' best friend, Maria is a strong-minded and loyal confidant

name: Minn-Erva
description: Starforce's talented sniper, Minn-Erva is deadly from near and far.

name: Nakia
description: A formidable Wakandan, Nakia finds herself conflicted thanks to her feelings for T'Chall

name: Nebula
description: As a pirate and mercenary with her intentions set on conquering other empires, this daughter of Thanos is feared by many across the star systems

name: Nick Fury
description: A veteran S.H.I.E.L.D. operative, Nick Fury continues the legacy as one of the greatest super spies in the world

name: Odin
description: The King of Asgard, Odin's immense wisdom helps him battle threats from both outside and within his real

name: Okoye
description: One of Wakanda's greatest warriors, Okoye proudly protects her country's king alongside the Dora Milaje.

name: Peggy Carter
description: An agent who fought alongside Captain America during World War II, Peggy Carter is a naturally born leader and staunch supporter of justice.

name: Phastos
description: The genius Phastos has nudged humanityâ€™s technological advancements forward throughout the centuries while shielding his own brillianc

name: Phil Coulson
description: His devotion to upholding the legacy and duties of Super Heroes makes Phil Coulson the true definition of an agent of S.H.I.E.L.

name: Proxima Midnight
description: Proxima Midnight conquers across the galaxy for her master Thanos, with her deadly spear ever ready to strik

description: Alexei is known most famously as Red Roomâ€™s answer to Captain America. Heâ€™s a Super-Soldier spy who has lived a lifetime of triumph during the Cold War.

description: NA

name: Rocket
description: As the weapons and tactical expert of the Guardians of the Galaxy, Rocket risks his hide to defend the cosmo

name: Ronan
description: As a cruel and fanatical member of the Kree race, Ronan double-crossed Thanos in an attempt to keep the Power Stone for himself.

name: Captain America
description: Sam Wilson, formerly the Falcon, takes on the mantle of Captain America as he teams up with his fellow Avengers.

name: Wanda Maximoff
movie: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
description: Notably powerful, Wanda Maximoff has fought both against and with the Avengers, attempting to hone her abilities and do what she believes is right to help the world

name: Sersi
description: The humankind-loving Eternal Sersi delights in her mission stationed on Earth; sheâ€™s as happy working as a museum curator as she is saving humanit

movie: Shang-Chi and The Legend of The Ten Ring
description: NA

name: Shocker
description: Herman Schultz combines his engineering intellect and past experience in criminality to embody the persona of Shocke

name: Shuri
description: The younger sister of T'Challa, the Black Panther, Shuri astounds with her brilliant inventions, often providing key components to her brother's battles

name: Spider-Man
description: Bitten by a radioactive spider, Peter Parkerâ€™s arachnid abilities give him amazing powers he uses to help others, while his personal life continues to offer plenty of obstacles.

name: Sprite
description: The Eternal Sprite is the grandiose storyteller of the group who just so happens to possess the appearance of a 13-year-old girl

name: Star-Lord
description: Leader of the Guardians of the Galaxy, Peter Quill, known as Star-Lord, brings a sassy sense of humor while protecting the universe from any and all threats

name: Talos
description: Talos, perhaps the most cunning spy in all of the Skrull Empire, is a master of shapeshifting and intergalactic espionag

name: Taskmaster
description: Taskmaster is a masked assassin who carries out deadly missions on behalf of the Red Roo

name: Thanos
description: The Mad Titan Thanos quests across the universe in search of the Infinity Stones, intending to use their limitless power for shocking purposes.

name: Thena
description: The fierce warrior Thena is more comfortable in battle than anywhere els

name: Thor
description: The son of Odin uses his mighty abilities as the God of Thunder to protect his home Asgard and planet Earth alik

name: Ultron
description: The creation gone awry, the sentient robot Ultron hates and seeks to wipe out humanity.

name: Valkyrie
description: Valkyrie uses her superhuman strength to defend Asgard.

name: Vision
description: The android called Vision defies physics and fights as an Avenger with the power of density manipulation and his flawless computer brain

name: Vulture
description: Equipped with an impressive flying appartus, Adrian Toomes takes to the skies as the winged menace known as the Vulture.

name: War Machine
description: Military veteran James Rhodes is ready for combat in his advanced armor, adding a formidable arsenal to Tony Stark-created designs.

name: Wasp
description: Janet Van Dyne, daughter of world-renowned scientist Vernon Van Dyne, is a founding member and long time leader of the Avengers, with the ability to shrink, fly and control insects

name: Wasp
description: Showing the same scientific aptitude as her father, Hank Pym, Nadia Pym is inspired by both him and Janet van Dyne to fly into action as part of a new generation of heroes.

name: Winter Soldier
description: Bucky Barnes was brought back from his supposed death to be a brainwashed assassin called Winter Soldier. Reformed by his friends, he now fights alongside the Avengers.

name: Wong
movie: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
description: A master of the martial and mystic arts, Wong is a close companion of Doctor Strange

name: Yon-Rogg
description: As the leader of a squad of elite Kree soldiers, Yon-Rogg takes newly-recruited Carol Danvers under his wing and trains her.

name: Yondu
description: Adventurer and natural mystic, Yondu wields a mighty bow with Yaka arrows that move according to his whistle

name: Agent Mobius
description: Mobius is an agent for the Time Variance Authority who specializes in the investigations of particularly dangerous time criminals.

name: Zemo

description: Fueled by revenge, Zemo blames the Avengers for their role in his family's deaths and uses every skill in his arsenal to take down the arrogant Super Heroes.

description: The Watcher is a being who exists outside the planes of space and time. He sees every moment that has happened, will happen, or is happening, and not just in our universe...
